Gallery

This is a simple gallery of images generated with this workflow. Each provides the source required to generate the image – often this is running a plotting script from bin, other times it is a custom workflow.

Data Sources

National Hydrologic Data across resolutions

python bin/plot_hucs.py --source-huc=NHD --source-hydro=NHD --output-filename=docs/static/gallery_sources_nhd.png 060102020103
